modName: Jarl Clothes with Sleeves - Emperor Retexture
descriptionHtml:
DEPENDENT ON OMEGARED\'S ARMOR COMPILATION.

10/16/12
 i made all the sleeve fur match the fur on the neck for each type. if you installed the first one uninstall reinstall new one and re acquire them through the protocols detailed below.



stands alone variant to jarl clothes with sleeves. looks similar to emperor robes. to get it open console and type;
help \"yarl\"  (edit* there is some disput over whether this should be jarl with a j. i offer no opinions or advice on this matter. type at your own risk\"
additem as per which you want etc

as of yet on females it is just the boring vanilla emperors robes. females have a lot of sexy naked armors. you could try those.

doesn\'t replace anything. In my game I have some of the jarl\'s wear them but its part of an esp i made giving all guards soldiers nobles jarls  more winter appropriate variants of their clothes. if people want me to upload it i will consider it

permission use as you see fit
author: frank zunge
